content.html: Find me any tech worker who would rather have a stocked snack kitchen and laundry than dignity and autonomy at work. Seriously. To wrap up... If Twitter recovers, there will likely be a push to credit authoritarian leadership, mass layoffs, and treating workers like shit.
content.value:
Find me any tech worker who would rather have a stocked snack kitchen and laundry than dignity and autonomy at work. Seriously.

To wrap up... If Twitter recovers, there will likely be a push to credit authoritarian leadership, mass layoffs, and treating workers like shit.
